About Me

About Me

Hello Friends! My name is Marvin, a student in Portland, OR.

Over the years, I have started writing essays (or as others like to call it, blog posts) to express my personal thoughts. I’ve always been restricted by the location where I post my work. Either it was too expensive (essentially not free), didn’t fit my visual standards, or required too much friction to post. This site you see now is the best solution I could find.

This new website provides the foundation I need to begin writing and posting on a more regualar basis. Once I’ve got more time, I will fully develop this website (which means learning how to build a Jekyll Theme and some Ruby) to better represent myself. For now, this will suffice.

Marvin Lin
